unit.decl_stmt:
static char *cmds[] = {
"define",
#define SIGNCMD_DEFINE 0
"undefine",
#define SIGNCMD_UNDEFINE 1
"list",
#define SIGNCMD_LIST 2
"place",
#define SIGNCMD_PLACE 3
"unplace",
#define SIGNCMD_UNPLACE 4
"jump",
#define SIGNCMD_JUMP 5
NULL
#define SIGNCMD_LAST 6
};
